name: Reverse Pyramid Training — ~12 min per exercise
time_per_session_breakdown: 3 sets: heavy ~20s + 2-3 min rest; medium ~30s + 2 min rest; light ~40s
overview_and_execution: Start heavy for 6 reps, rest 2-3 min, reduce weight ~10-15% for ~8 reps, rest 2 min, then reduce again for ~10 reps. Increase top set weight once you hit the upper rep goals smoothly.
example_application: Squat: 6×300 lb, 8×270 lb, 10×240 lb. When 6-8-10 is easy, raise top set weight.
important_notes: First set is the heaviest, subsequent sets reduce load but increase reps. Strict rest times are key for consistency.
